content.question: Directions: In your responses, be sure to address all parts of the questions you answer . Use complete sentences; an outline or bulleted list alone is not acceptable.Answer (a), (b), and (c): Describe one of Lenin’s critiques of the Russian monarchy.Describe one effect of Lenin’s critique on Russian politics.Explain how Stalin’s policies departed from Lenin’s policies.

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
